short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows your previous guesses in the NYT connections game

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple helper to display previous guesses in the NYT Connections game. Guesses will appear below the active game and also keep track of one-aways and correct guesses.
